question: Bethesda Softworks, which was recently in news, is a software company mainly known for __?
explanation: Recently, Microsoft had announced its plans to acquire US-based ZeniMax Media, the parent company of Bethesda Softworks.  Bethesda Softworks is one of the largest, privately held game developers and publishers in the world. Microsoft is to acquire the company for $7.5 billion. The deal comes as a major boost for Xbox – Microsoft’s gaming offering, with Bethesda bringing an impressive portfolio of games, technology, talent, as well as a track record of blockbuster commercial success
